TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SessionSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 定義包含與工作階段相關聯之資料的安全性權杖。

span.span: Defines a security token that contains data associated with a session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作階段權杖儲存與工作階段，以及定義工作階段; 其他參數相關聯的使用者，例如工作階段開始和結束時間。A session token stores the of the user that is associated with a session as well as other parameters that define the session; for example the session start and end times. 在被動的情況下，會呼叫(SAM) 從驗證管線，以建立從工作階段權杖，代表已驗證的使用者。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 會使用其設定才能建立語彙基元，並將它序列化為 cookie （和還原序列化的權杖上的後續要求的 cookie）。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 會使用其設定的執行個體寫回至 HTTP 回應 cookie 的類別。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 此 cookie 則傳回至用戶端，並在後續要求的 cookie，而不是反覆存取進行重新取得安全性權杖的身分識別提供者，可以呈現用戶端。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 如需有關如何使用 WIF 工作階段的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WIF 工作階段管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). 如需在 Web 伺服陣列案例中使用工作階段資訊，請參閱[WIF 和 Web 伺服陣列](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 工作階段權杖可以在其中一個參考模式中操作，或不。A session token can operate in either reference mode or not. 如果工作階段權杖不在參考模式中運作，將整個語彙基元會序列化為儲存在用戶端工作階段 cookie 中。If the session token is not operating in reference mode, the entire token is serialized into the session cookie that is stored on the client. 序列化的工作階段權杖可能會相當大，因此儲存在用戶端的 cookie 也可以是相當相當。The serialized session token can be quite large and thus the cookie stored on the client can also be quite sizeable. 在參考模式中，而不是序列化整個工作階段 cookie 語彙基元時，權杖會儲存在工作階段的安全性權杖快取，並僅用來產生所需從快取擷取權杖的金鑰資訊會儲存在 cookie 中。In reference mode, rather than serializing the entire session token into the cookie, the token is stored in a session security token cache and only the information used to generate the key necessary to retrieve the token from the cache is stored in the cookie. 這可大幅減少之 cookie 的大小。This can greatly reduce the size of the cookie. 工作階段權杖快取藉由衍生自類別和快取索引鍵由實作類別。The session token cache is implemented by a class derived from and the cache key is implemented by the class. 並屬性會用於類別來產生快取索引鍵。The and properties are used in the class to generate the cache key. 屬性會決定是否處於參考模式的工作階段權杖。The property determines whether the session token is in reference mode or not. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在參考模式中操作 Microsoft 建議您提供的處理常式事件中的 global.asax.cs 檔案及設定傳入的權杖上屬性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 這可確保工作階段權杖會以每個要求的參考模式運作，且優先只要設定工作階段驗證模組上的屬性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module. WIF 所提供的類別會序列化為 Ws-secure Conversation 工作階段權杖``項目。The class provided with WIF serializes the session token as a WS-Secure Conversation `` element.

span.span: WIF Session Management

related.span: WIF 和 Web 伺服陣列

span.span: WIF and Web Farms

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`null`| ||設定為產生的唯一識別碼。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||| ||設定為產生的唯一識別碼。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| || 加上屬性。 plus the property.| ||`null`| ||包含產生的 128 位元對稱金鑰。Contains a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 的預設實作不會使用這個屬性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 簽署和加密金鑰會取決於所套用的 cookie 轉換處理語彙基元。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||| || 加上屬性。 plus the property.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`context`| ||`contextId` 或者，如果`contextId`是`null`，產生的唯一識別碼。`contextId` or, if `contextId` is `null`, a generated unique ID.| ||`endpointId`| ||設定為產生的唯一識別碼。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`validFrom`| ||`validFrom` 再加上`lifetime`。`validFrom` plus `lifetime`.| ||`null`| ||包含單一項目是`key`或者，如果`key`是`null`，產生的 128 位元對稱金鑰。Contains single element that is either `key` or, if `key` is `null`, a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 的預設實作不會使用這個屬性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 簽署和加密金鑰會取決於所套用的 cookie 轉換處理語彙基元。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||`validFrom`| ||`validFrom` 再加上`lifetime`。`validFrom` plus `lifetime`.|

new System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken : System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal * System.Xml.UniqueId * string * string * Nullable<DateTime> * Nullable<DateTime> * System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken (claimsPrincipal, contextId, context, endpointId, validFrom, validTo, key)

param.name: claimsPrincipal
param.span: 與此工作階段相關聯的宣告主體。

span.span: The claims principal that is associated with this session.

param.name: contextId
param.span: 與這個權杖關聯的內容識別項。

span.span: The context identifier associated with this token.

param.name: context
param.span: 應用程式特定的選擇性內容字串。

span.span: An optional, application-specific context string.

param.name: endpointId
param.span: 這個權杖要繫結至的端點。

span.span: The endpoint to which this token is bound.

param.span: 空字串會建立不限範圍的權杖。

span.span: An empty string creates an unscoped token.

param.name: validFrom
param.span: 瞬間，到此瞬間權杖即變成有效。

span.span: The time instant at which the token becomes valid.

param.span: 表示指定

span.span: to specify

param.name: validTo
param.span: 瞬間，超過此瞬間之後權杖不再有效。

span.span: The time instant after which the token is no longer valid.

param.span: 會指定該值應藉由將 屬性的值與 參數指定的時間相加來決定。

span.span: to specify that the value should be determined by adding the value of the property to the time specified by the parameter.

param.name: key
param.span: 選擇性對稱工作階段金鑰。

span.span: An optional symmetric session key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`context`| ||`contextId`| ||`endpointId`| ||設定為產生的唯一識別碼。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||設定的值為屬性所決定的`ValidFrom`參數。Set to the value of the property as determined by the `ValidFrom` parameter.| ||值屬性所決定的`ValidTo`參數。The value of the property as determined by the `ValidTo` parameter.| ||`null`| ||包含單一項目是`key`或者，如果`key`是`null`，產生的 128 位元對稱金鑰。Contains single element that is either `key` or, if `key` is `null`, a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 的預設實作不會使用這個屬性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 簽署和加密金鑰會取決於所套用的 cookie 轉換處理語彙基元。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||值`validFrom`參數，或者，如果`validFrom`是`null`， 。The value of the `validFrom` parameter, or, if `validFrom` is `null`, .| ||`validFrom` 參數的值。The value of the `validFrom` parameter. 如果`validFrom`已`null`，值屬性 (由`validFrom`參數) 加上屬性。If `validFrom` is `null`, the value of the property (as determined by the `validFrom` parameter) plus the property.|

summary.span: 取得與工作階段相關聯的宣告主體。

span.span: Gets the claims principal associated with the session.
The claims principal.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As String
public: property System::String ^ Context { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用者指定的內容值。

span.span: Gets a user specified context value.
The user specified context value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來儲存應用程式專屬的內容。You can use this property to store application-specific context.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContextId As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ ContextId { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得工作階段內容識別項。

span.span: Gets the session context identifier
The session context identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跨所有工作階段權杖的內容識別項是唯一的。The context identifier is unique across all session tokens. 類別來產生金鑰，以在權杖使用的內容識別碼和金鑰產生。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 類別會序列化此屬性維持``子項目``項目。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndpointId As String
public: property System::String ^ EndpointId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得此語彙基元的範圍結束點的 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of the endpoint to which this token is scoped.
The ID of the endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果屬性是`null`、 為全域範圍的工作階段權杖都會被視為類別。If the property is `null`, the session token is treated as globally scoped by the class. 這可能會有潛在的安全性風險。This can present a potential security risk.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得此權杖的唯一識別碼。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier of this token.
The token ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會序列化此屬性維持`Id`屬性``項目。The class serializes this property as the `Id` attribute of the `` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsPersistent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示這個權杖所表示的 cookie 是否為持續性的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie represented by this token is persistent.

value.span: 如果 cookie 是永續性的，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cookie is persistent; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，cookie 會撰寫為永續性 cookie。If the property is `true`, the cookie is written as a persistent cookie. 在過期前，關閉瀏覽器後，持續性 cookie 維持有效。Persistent cookies remain valid after the browser is closed until they expire.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReferenceMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsReferenceMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出工作階段安全性權杖是否正在參考模式下操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the session security token is operating in reference mode.

value.span: 如果權杖正在工作階段模式下操作，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the token is operating in session mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在參考模式中，在序列化期間產生簡單的成品，並將權杖的內容儲存在權杖的權杖處理常式相關聯的快取中。In reference mode, a simple artifact is produced during serialization and the token material is stored in the token cache that is associated with the token handler. 權杖快取是衍生自類別的執行個體。The token cache is an instance of a class that derives from . Web 伺服陣列的情況下，權杖的快取必須在伺服陣列中的所有節點之間運作。For Web Farm scenarios, the token cache must operate across all nodes in the farm. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在參考模式中操作 Microsoft 建議您提供的處理常式事件中的 global.asax.cs 檔案及設定傳入的權杖上屬性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 這可確保工作階段權杖會以每個要求的參考模式運作，且優先只要設定工作階段驗證模組上的屬性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyEffectiveTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime KeyEffectiveTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得權杖中的金鑰開始有效的瞬間。

span.span: Gets the time instant from which the key in this token is valid.

value.span: 此金鑰為有效的起始瞬間。

span.span: The time instant from which the key is effective.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyExpirationTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime KeyExpirationTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得瞬間，超過之後這個權杖中的金鑰不再有效。

span.span: Gets the time instant after which the key in this token is no longer valid.
The time instant at which the key expires.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyGeneration As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ KeyGeneration { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個權杖中金鑰產生的識別項

span.span: Gets the identifier for the key generation in this token

value.span: 這個權杖中金鑰產生的唯一識別項。

span.span: The unique identifier for the key generation in this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性內是唯一的工作階段權杖。The property is unique within a session token. 當發出工作階段權杖時有只有一個內容識別碼，可透過存取屬性。When a session token is issued it has only a context ID, which is accessible through the property. 當更新的工作階段權杖時，會新增金鑰的產生。When the session token is renewed, the key generation is added. 類別來產生金鑰，以在權杖使用的內容識別碼和金鑰產生。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 類別會序列化此屬性維持``子項目``項目。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecureConversationVersion As Uri
public: property Uri ^ SecureConversationVersion { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可識別 WS-Secure Conversation 版本的 URI，該 WS-Secure Conversation 用於序列化這個工作階段安全性權杖。

span.span: Gets a URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this session security token.

value.span: 可識別 WS-Secure Conversation 版本的 URI，該 WS-Secure Conversation 用於序列化這個權杖。

span.span: The URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別支援的 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 和 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3。The base class supports WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 and WS-Secure Conversation 1.3. 這些版本的 Ws-secure Conversation 的 Uri 是"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc"和"http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512"分別。The URIs for these versions of WS-Secure Conversation are "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc" and "http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512" respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SecurityKeys As ReadOnlyCollection(Of SecurityKey)

summary.span: 取得與這個工作階段相關聯的索引鍵。

span.span: Gets the keys associated with this session.

summary.span: 這通常是單一金鑰。

span.span: This is usually a single key.

value.span: 與工作階段相關聯的金鑰。

span.span: The keys associated with the session.
There is usually a single key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 預設實作不使用這個屬性。The default implementation does not use this property. 簽署和加密金鑰會取決於所套用的 cookie 轉換處理語彙基元。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.

public: virtual property DateTime ValidFrom { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得瞬間，超過之後權杖無效。

span.span: Gets the time instant from which the token is valid.

value.span: 權杖成為有效的起始時間。

span.span: The time from which the token is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValidTo As DateTime
public: virtual property DateTime ValidTo { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得瞬間，超過之後權杖不再有效。

span.span: Gets the time instant after which the token is no longer valid.

value.span: 在此時間之後權杖不再有效。

span.span: The time after which the token is no longer valid.
